body.name: Karl home Luggage Set of 3 Hardside Carry on Suitcase Sets with Spinner Wheels & TSA lock, Portable Lightweight ABS Luggages for Travel, Business - Dark Green (20/24/28)
features: 【Durable & Waterproof】Our family suitcase set features sturdy watertight ABS external, which is easy to clean and long-term use. It can carry a large weight while having four swivel wheels that can move effortlessly in any direction.

【Modern Appearance】The stylish and smooth vertical stripe design of the rolling luggage makes it more resistant to pressure and wear and brings a good mood to your journey. It includes four moulded side feet, they allow the luggage to remain upright even when standing on its side.

【Retractable Handle】The ergonomically designed push-button 3-step adjustable telescopic handle makes opening and closing a breeze. What's more, it fits any size hand and reduces stress when climbing stairs.

【Practical Internal Design】The interior of the trip suitcases provide ample space that you can use to place anything you need to carry, such as clothing, documents, daily necessities, etc. In addition, the interior is equipped with a crossover strap to provide better protection for items during use.

【Quality Guarantee】Creating quality products are our philosophy. Includes 1-year manufacturer's warranty. Any after-sale problems please feel free to contact us. We will offer you 24 hours customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for College or light travel use
reviews.reviewText: Purchased a set quite a few years ago for light family travel, work great for the price and quality is very reasonable. Not full destruction proof, but more sturdier than expected. Purchased a second set recently for College student, work great for home travel light and compact for occasional travel. Definitely a great set for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but shipping sucks
reviews.reviewText: These are so nice. I bought them for a family trip and when I unpacked them the were better then I expected. Them have a zipper divider with and pocket a combination lock and are pretty. The material doesn't feel very durable and I paid an extra 20 something for Shipping but overall I'm excited and so are my girls. Let's see if they hold up to the TSA toss aground.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased the dark blue set for a trip. The color was nice and easy to spot our bags in the airport baggage carousel. Unfortunately, these suitcases did not fair well in the airport luggage system. We used the 2 largest bags in the set. These were checked. The middle size bag only had a few scratches and marks on it after airport use. Unfortunately, the largest bag zipper didn’t stay closed leaving our contents exposed in baggage claim. It also has several marks on it after general airport badge use. The outer case is not as durable as it needs to be. However, the biggest concern was the reliability of the zipper. I would not recommend this set of luggage. I would give it 0 stars if I could due to having our contents spilling out on the baggage carousel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vendor was great to work with
reviews.reviewText: The luggage is cute, and the price point was good for what you are getting versus the stores but the vendor Karlhome was responsive with questions and customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used a few trips flying, so far so good no issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The three suitcases are perfect for travel, the wheels roll nicely, the lock is easy to set and reset if needed. Very durable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 28 inch Wheels broke off
reviews.reviewText: I firmly believe these are good suitcases I might have just overloaded them and they didn't do well at high capacity. I had about 48 pounds of stuff packed, inadvertently dropped it and one of the wheels came clean off followed by another after . I take responsibility for that though and would still recommend, just not if you tend to pack heavy. Not sure how extensively they are drop tested. the other two bags are still working fine however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product was exactly as described. Excellent. I would recommend.
